review: It's a really good product as described. The only problem i have is the my kids took over the TV!
author: nikki "nikki"

review: more content than similar devices and services
author: allen smith

review: I have to say I was a bit concerned not knowing much about this item but with all honesty, was a breeze to install and worked within minutes!  This is most definitely making me rethink how I watch the tube.  I'd say having Prime and this stick, things are gonna change around here!
author: Jewel Ruby

review: Easy installation, easy to operate. Gonna luv it!!!:)
author: Rebecca Landgraf

review: I was just looking for a device to stream Netflix and I got so much more  I love it
author: karen mcCollin

review: I love the small device and it streams very well most of the time.  However, I have been having issues with streaming my amazon prime??  Lots of stopping & starting ( i know this is not my internet connection, because Netflix etc. stream fine).  It is frustrating!  You would think that an amazon device would stream amazon shows a bit better!  Sometimes it works for 2-3 seconds, then stops and spins for a minute or more, the plays a couple seconds, then stops again!
author: Allison
